remarks.format: ## Remarks ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 完全信任立即呼叫者。Full trust for the immediate caller. 這個成員無法供部分信任的程式碼使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[從部分信任程式碼使用程式庫](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 完全信任立即呼叫者。Full trust for the immediate caller. 這個成員無法供部分信任的程式碼使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[從部分信任程式碼使用程式庫](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 完全信任立即呼叫者。Full trust for the immediate caller. 這個成員無法供部分信任的程式碼使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[從部分信任程式碼使用程式庫](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property NamespaceName As String
public: property System::String ^ NamespaceName { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: Gets or sets the namespace for instrumentation instances and events in this assembly.

span.span: Gets or sets the namespace for instrumentation instances and events in this assembly.

value.span: 傳回值，其中包含的命名空間名稱 instrumentation 執行個體和這個組件中的事件。

span.span: Returns a value containing the name of the namespace for instrumentation instances and events in this assembly.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 強烈建議的命名空間名稱可由組件，指定與它應該是唯一的命名空間每個組件，或每個應用程式。It is highly recommended that the namespace name be specified by the assembly, and that it should be a unique namespace per assembly, or per application. 取得特定的命名空間的每個組件或應用程式檢測可讓更多資料粒度保護檢測由不同的組件或應用程式所提供的存取。Having a specific namespace for each assembly or application instrumentation allows more granularity for securing access to instrumentation provided by different assemblies or applications. ## 屬性值Property Value 如果未指定，預設命名空間將會設定為"\\\\.\root\default"。If not specified, the default namespace will be set as "\\\\.\root\default". 否則，表示 instrumentation 執行個體和事件，這個組件中的命名空間名稱的字串。Otherwise, a string indicating the name of the namespace for instrumentation instances and events in this assembly. ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 完全信任立即呼叫者。Full trust for the immediate caller. 這個成員無法供部分信任的程式碼使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[從部分信任程式碼使用程式庫](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property SecurityDescriptor As String
public: property System::String ^ SecurityDescriptor { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: Gets or sets a security descriptor that allows only the specified users or groups to run applications that provide the instrumentation supported by this assembly.

span.span: Gets or sets a security descriptor that allows only the specified users or groups to run applications that provide the instrumentation supported by this assembly.

value.span: 傳回值，其中包含允許只有指定的使用者或群組執行提供這個組件所支援的檢測的應用程式的安全性描述元。

span.span: Returns a value containing the security descriptor that allows only the specified users or groups to run applications that provide the instrumentation supported by this assembly.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用者或群組未指定此安全性描述元中可能仍可執行應用程式，但是無法從這個組件提供檢測。Users or groups not specified in this security descriptor may still run the application, but cannot provide instrumentation from this assembly. ## 屬性值Property Value 如果是 null，預設值被定義為本機 Administrators 群組。If null, the default value is defined as the Local Administrators Group. 這將只允許發行資料，並引發事件，從這個組件的本機 administrators 群組的成員。This will only allow members of the local administrators group to publish data and fire events from this assembly. 否則，這是表示定義哪些使用者和群組，可以提供協調資料與事件從這個應用程式的安全性描述元的 SDDL 格式的字串。Otherwise, this is a string in SDDL format representing the security descriptor that defines which users and groups can provide instrumentation data and events from this application. ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 完全信任立即呼叫者。Full trust for the immediate caller. 這個成員無法供部分信任的程式碼使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[從部分信任程式碼使用程式庫](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).
